activeKey.description: The key of the currently expanded panel
activeKey.description_zh: The key of the currently expanded panel
activeKey.type: accordion mode: string | null non-accordion mode: string[]

arrow.description: Custom arrow. if you pass a ReactNode, antd-mobile will add a rotate animation for you.
arrow.description_zh: Custom arrow. if you pass a ReactNode, antd-mobile will add a rotate animation for you.

defaultActiveKey.description: The key of the expanded panel by default
defaultActiveKey.description_zh: The key of the expanded panel by default
defaultActiveKey.type: accordion mode: string | null non-accordion mode: string[]

events.name: onChange
events.description: Triggered when the panel is switched
events.description_zh: Triggered when the panel is switched
events.params: accordion mode: (activeKey: string | null) => void  non-accordion mode: (activeKey: string[]) => void
